name: Anthill Art Store 3D
description:
Are you a good craftsman? This is a highly satisfying craft game, give it a try to make your own art.
An incredible metal structure is made by pouring molten metal into a fire ant colony. Explore the underground, find how ants build their home.
You can use silver, gold, iron, Aluminum, or others……unlock more material to make a silvery, golden, colorful, or even a pure black structure, that is totally up to you.
DIY your own ant colony art structure.
Try to guess what it would look like and how much does it weighs.

1：Choose One Anthill
2：Pouring the melted metal liquid
3：Digging and remove the cast
4：Washing it
5：Measuring it and Finish!

Furthermore, you can open your own anthill art store and sell it for profit. Make more money to decorate and upgrade your store. If you really like your art you can choose to make that a collection.

All right, it's time. Let's make some art and fun!
